overview:
Cloud9software.ie offers a comprehensive solution that delivers a completely seamless, single and affordable ERP, CRM and accounting suite for the SME market wishing to run their businesses more efficiently, improve their information management and be more pro-active with their customers; while on the road or in the office and not have to worry about the expense of ongoing hardware and software.

Cloud9software.ie provides SMEâ€™s with a complete online SaaS suite (B2B, B2C, B2D, B2E and B2G) with a single seamless solution that would automate their key business processes connect all stakeholders and provide real-time generation of management accounts. Reducing operating cost etcâ€¦â€¦

Cloud9 Limited (Cloud9software.ie) is a privately held company registered in the Republic of Ireland and has successful customers using the solution in many different industries, across Ireland and the UK.
